title: Database Connection Pool Exhaustion
description: The application is throwing errors indicating it cannot get a connection to the database.

tasks.description: Check the database monitoring dashboard and confirm that the number of active connections is at its maximum limit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies that the connection pool is exhausted.

tasks.description: Temporarily increase the maximum connection limit to restore service immediately.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent applies a temporary fix to mitigate the outage.

tasks.description: Investigate which application service is holding onto connections and not releasing them properly.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds a memory leak in a specific microservice is causing the issue.

tasks.description: Restart the problematic microservice to clear the stuck connections and create a ticket for the owning team to fix the underlying leak.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent resolves the immediate issue and ensures a long-term fix is tracked.
